org.gradle.platform.base

Interface ComponentSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Named
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationSpec, CUnitTestSuiteSpec, GoogleTestTestSuiteSpec, JUnitTestSuiteSpec, JvmComponentSpec, JvmLibrarySpec, JvmTestSuiteSpec, LibrarySpec, NativeComponentSpec, NativeExecutableSpec, NativeLibrarySpec, NativeTestSuiteSpec, PlatformAwareComponentSpec, PlayApplicationSpec, PlayPlatformAwareComponentSpec, TargetedNativeComponent, TestSuiteSpec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseComponentSpec

    @Incubating
public interface ComponentSpec
extends Named
    A software component that is built by a Gradle project.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.gradle.api.Named

        Named.Namer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ModelMap<BinarySpec> getBinaries()
      The binaries that are built for this component.
      String getDisplayName()
      Returns a human-consumable display name for this component.
      String getProjectPath()
      The path to the project containing this component.
      ModelMap<LanguageSourceSet> getSource()
      Deprecated. 
      This method is replaced with getSources().

      The source sets that are used to build this component.
